segments.text: It's truly something to witness someone so utterly absorbed in a task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues to dry her plate with such precision and focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her whole world seems to revolve around that one shining dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even flinch at the cold water soaking her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself wondering what thoughts occupy her mind right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Is she daydreaming, or just incredibly good at shutting out distractions?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the children's urgent and secret mission is stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if she exists in a different dimension within the same room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a touch of sadness for her, being so disconnected from her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of unawareness is almost a superpower, in a strange way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she looks down before that puddle becomes a small pond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight is both amusing and deeply concerning all at once.
segments.speaker: PAR
